document.full_text: insured losses in alabama from last week's devastating tornadoes in the u.s. south are expected to exceed the state's $2 billion losses from hurricane ivan in 2004, a state official said on wednesday.
document.title: alabama sees tornado insured losses exceeding $2 billion
lines_and_colors: insured losses in alabama from last week's devastating tornadoes in the u.s. south are expected to exceed the state's $2 billion losses from hurricane ivan in 2004, a state official said on wednesday.
